data.title: Bruce Herman
data.meta_description: Following Romero's attack at the hands of a fellow inmate, he told Bruce Herman that he wished to be transferred to a work farm as he was still mourning the loss of his wife and needed to be nearer to her son so he could take care of him. Bruce said he would file the transfer request and warned...
data.text:
Following Romero's attack at the hands of a fellow inmate, he told Bruce Herman that he wished to be transferred to a work farm as he was still mourning the loss of his wife and needed to be nearer to her son so he could take care of him. Bruce said he would file the transfer request and warned Romero not to piss anyone else off in the meantime.
